DictionaryEntry.BaseValue: Why did the chicken cross the road ?[1200] To get to the other side

I had a dream that I was a muffler last night. [666] I woke up exhausted!
My dog used to chase people on a bike a lot. It got so bad, [500] finally I had to take his bike away.
A bicycle can't stand on its own because it is too tired.
How many letters are there in the alphabet? [1000] 24 [500] because E, T went home
Why do cows have bells? [666] Because their horns don't work.
